page.title: 20PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: {TOY GAMES}Playing with model cars and space ships is very popular. Recently there have been many figures produced from television series which are played with a great deal. Also advertised a lot on TV are Care Bears which are small plastic teddies. The most popular of all these recent fashions has been My Little Pony, a plastic pony with long hair and a comb to groom it with. All of these fashionable toys are very expensive. There are also traditional toys like marbles. {SMALL BALL GAMES}A number of games where the players take it in turn to use a small ball often against a wall are popular eg Sevensies. {PRETEND GAMES}These are most popular with the infants. They are sometimes based on TV programmes. {HOPSCOTCH}is also played on markings.
